rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with floor-to-ceiling windows to allow ample natural light and a luxurious feel. Designed in Colonial style with polished marble floors, ornate detailing, and modern lighting.

Open concept living room featuring high ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall to ensure vibrant natural light. Merging colonial elegance with contemporary luxury, it includes an integrated entertainment zone and comfortable seating arrangements.
Elegant dining area designed for formal entertaining. Features a grand dining table and matching chairs in Colonial design with modern touches that blend heritage style with luxury living.

Spacious master bedroom designed for maximum comfort and privacy. It includes built-in wardrobes, a walk-in closet, an ensuite bathroom with luxury fittings, and extensive use of floor-to-ceiling windows to maintain natural light.
Comfortable secondary bedroom ensuring privacy. Features ample storage options, a dedicated study area, and floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural lighting.
Charming child bedroom designed for comfort with playful yet colonial style accents. Includes built-in storage and safe, floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring a bright environment.

Dedicated servants quarters providing comfortable living space including small kitchenette, bathroom, and separate entry from the main building. Designed to maintain privacy and efficiency in service areas.

openings.description: Grand entrance door with reinforced security features and a modern touch that aligns with colonial aesthetics. The north-facing door adheres to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Expansive rear window offering views of the landscaped garden, enhancing privacy and natural ventilation in alignment with sustainable design practices.
